data.message:
I was dying everyday, until that day i met your music and i started to live again, so thank you Marshall Mathers, the only thing that for me matters now it's the music i will always write for the people without no purpose in life, so thank you again, i'll never forget what you are and how you've saved me from the way to falling down. <3
(That's my first comment and i hope you read what i have wrote, i'm Italian anyway)
